# label

**Instance Property**

An optional name that can help you identify the command buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var label: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set labels to help you quickly identify a command buffer at runtime in the Metal debugging and profiling tools. See [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Xcode/Naming-resources-and-commands].

## Identifying the command buffer

- **commandQueue**: The command queue that creates the command buffer.
- **device**: The GPU device that indirectly owns the command buffer because you create it from a command queue the device also owns.
